bot_description:
🌟Welcome to the TonPass Bot!🌟

We're glad to have you here! 😊
TonPass provides instant and secure SMS activation services
for all your online verification needs. 🌐

Ready to get started? Simply choose an option below and experience
smooth, reliable SMS verifications.

🔥 Fast, simple, and efficient! 🔥
bot_markdown_description:
🌟*Welcome to the TonPass Bot\!*🌟

We're glad to have you here\! 😊
TonPass provides *instant and secure* SMS activation services
for all your online verification needs\. 🌐

Ready to get started? Simply choose an option below and experience
smooth, reliable SMS verifications\.

🔥 *Fast, simple, and efficient\!* 🔥
help_cmd_short_description_cmd: Provides instructions for interacting with the bot
short_description: Easily obtain SMS activation codes for various online services. Simply request a code for services like Google, Instagram, and Facebook, and quickly and efficiently receive your verification SMS.
help_cmd_text:
This bot allows you to easily send SMS activation codes to verify accounts for popular online services.

 📋 Available commands:
/start – Start interacting with the bot
unknown_cmd_text:
Unsupported command

Sorry, the command you entered is not recognized. Please ensure you are using one of the supported commands. Type /help to view the list of available commands and their usage.

choose_language.one: Your selected language is {{ .Language }}. Choose an option below
choose_language.other: Your selected language is {{ .Language }}. Choose an option below

select_sms_service: Please choose the online service you want to activate via SMS
select_sms_service_with_country: Select the country whose numbers you want to use:

enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency.description: Enter the amount for payment in currency
enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency.one: Enter the amount for payment in {{ .Currency }}
enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency.other: Enter the amount for payment in {{ .Currency }}

enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency_err: Please enter the amount in currency using the correct number format\. Examples: 12\.30, 12, 100, etc\.
crypto_bot_pay_title_markdown: To make a payment, press the 'Pay' button\.
balance_updated_markdown: Your account balance has been updated\. Thank you for using our service\!

choose_preferred_currency.one: Your selected preferred currency is {{ .Currency }}. Choose an option below
choose_preferred_currency.other: Your selected preferred currency is {{ .Currency }}. Choose an option below

success_received_sms_code_markdown.description: Your SMS activation code has been received!

start_registration_form_with_sms_code_ma.description: Please enter phone number in registration form
start_registration_form_with_sms_code_ma.one:
Please enter phone number *\{{ .PhoneNumber }}* in registration form\. Then, wait for the *SMS code*\. We’ll notify you as soon as it arrives\.

If for some reason the code does not arrive within *20 minutes*, the money will automatically be returned to your balance\.
start_registration_form_with_sms_code_ma.other: Please enter phone number *\{{ .PhoneNumber }}* in registration form\. Then, wait for the *SMS code*\. We’ll notify you as soon as it arrives\.If for some reason the code does not arrive within *20 minutes*, the money will automatically be returned to your balance\.

numbers_are_unavailable_markdown: Sorry, it looks like the numbers are unavailable right now\. Please try again
fail_to_order_sms_code_markdown: There was an issue with order SMS code. Please try again\.
internal_error_markdown: An internal error occurred\. Please try again later\.

not_receive_sms_code_markdown.description: Unfortunately, we did not receive *the sms code*\. As a result, we have refunded *the full amount*\. *Please try again*, and if the issue persists, feel free to contact our support team\. We apologize for the inconvenience\.
not_receive_sms_code_markdown.one: Unfortunately, we did not receive *the sms code* for *{{ .PhoneNumber }}*\. As a result, we have refunded *the full amount*\. *Please try again*, and if the issue persists, feel free to contact our support team\. We apologize for the inconvenience\.
not_receive_sms_code_markdown.other: Unfortunately, we did not receive *the sms code* for *{{ .PhoneNumber }}*\. As a result, we have refunded *the full amount*\. *Please try again*, and if the issue persists, feel free to contact our support team\. We apologize for the inconvenience\.

subscribe_to_channel_markdown.description: Tap the link below to subscribe to our Telegram channel
subscribe_to_channel_markdown.one: Want to keep using the bot? Subscribe to our *{{ .Channel }}* Telegram channel for instant updates and important announcements\! Subscribe Now
subscribe_to_channel_markdown.other: Want to keep using the bot? Subscribe to our *{{ .Channel }}* Telegram channel for instant updates and important announcements\! Subscribe Now
